name: H2O the Game
description:
A silly Short Game Based off the H2O Song that Tyranitar Tube made around 7 years ago as of 2019. This game is not what you will expect it to be about. (Also there is a Easter Egg somewhere in the game so let's see if you can find it.)

Hope you enjoy anyway.  :)

Warning this is a non profit Fan game, all music and Characters where added to enhance the game play and experience I own none of these things in the game, go support the Original creators.
